name: Wi-Fi Security Camera Footage
summary: An EPV file is a video created by one of several models of Wi-Fi security cameras. It contains footage recorded by the camera. EPV files can be played only in a camera's associated software, which is typically a smartphone app.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
